# rtx_ipv6_filter_dynamic (Resource)

Manages IPv6 dynamic (stateful) IP filters on RTX routers. Dynamic filters provide stateful packet inspection for protocols like FTP, HTTP, and SMTP.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `entry` (Block List, Min: 1) List of dynamic filter entries (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--entry))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--entry"></a>
### Nested Schema for `entry`

Required:

- `destination` (String) Destination address or '*' for any
- `number` (Number) Filter number (unique identifier)
- `protocol` (String) Protocol: ftp, www, smtp, submission, pop3, dns, telnet, ssh, tcp, udp, or *
- `source` (String) Source address or '*' for any

Optional:

- `syslog` (Boolean) Enable syslog for this filter
